1.title: Integration Engineer
description: Taking into ownership the tasks of leading the agile team while implementing the crucial changes into currently developing products.

Working with various languages, frameworks, cloud providers and API systems such as JavaScript, React.js, Next.js, CSS, Tailwind, Webpack, JEST, Azure, GCP, ServiceNow, FreshService, Power Platform, Python, Flask.
Contributing to the project by writing modern, maintainable and testable code that follows the company's standards.

2.title: Volunteer Software Engineer Instructor
description: Volunteer for CYF, a non-profit organization that trains refugees and disadvantaged people to become web developers and helps them to find work in the tech industry.
Roles include providing additional support to students in class, marking homework, assisting in their personal development through workshops, explaining technical concepts.
Main technologies include: Html, CSS, JavaScript, PostgreSQL, ReactJS, Express.js.

3.title: Volunteer Student Mentor
description: Supporting aspiring developers learning with School of Code during their intensive 16 weeks course.
Support includes but is not limited to solving technical problems and answering non-technical questions related to the IT sector.
Main technologies include: Html, CSS, JavaScript, PostgreSQL, ReactJS, Express.js.

4.title: Trainee
description: Helping other trainees in studies within the fields of HTML, CSS, JavaScript and SQL databases.
Studying and practising many new and difficult concepts, which proved that I can work under the stress and I am quick learner.
Working within a small development team to design and build an on-line quote application using React, SASS, Express and PostgreSQL.
